references: A. H. Beiler, Recreations in the Theory of Numbers, Dover, N.Y., 1964, pp. 194-196.
formula: The Hankel determinant transform is A025172(n-1). - _Michael Somos_, Sep 17 2006-(n+1)*(4*n-3)*a(n) + 2*(4*n+1)*(2*n-1)*a(n-1) = 0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 19 2014
author: _Barry E. Williams_, Dec 20 1999
